name: BattleZoo
description:
Planet-Hopping Local Multiplier Action RTS. This game is a bit difficult to understand, but it's a unique and fun 2 player local RTS!

conquer planets by building on them. 

Build generators for power. use power to build generators and factories.  Factories also require a constant upkeep of power, lowering your generator's power output!

Build factories for ships. ships automatically attack enemies. jump and press UP next to a ship to enter it and control it.

first player to control 10 planets for 10 seconds wins!

~ -player 1 jump

1 - player 1 shoot/build

WASD - player 1 movement

K player 2 jump

L player 2 shoot.build

arrows - player 2 movement

MADE WITH GAMEMAKER
